title: Value of funds raised through crowdfunding globally 2014 to 2016
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Amount in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 3.
Overall Amount in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Amount in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2016.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Amount in million U.S. dollars, about 762.52 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Amount in million U.S. dollars about 597.14 was reached at Year 2014
